problem_text_cn: 如图,一矩形与⊙O相交,若AB=4,BC=6,DE=2,则DF=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a rectangle intersects with ⊙O, if AB = N_0, BC = N_1, DE = N_2, then DF = ()
raw_answer: 解:作OM⊥BC于M,如图,则BM=CM=\frac{1}{2}BC=3,∵四边形ADHG为矩形,∴∠A=∠D=90°,∴四边形ADOM为矩形,∴OD=AM=AB+BM=4+3=7,∴OE=OD-DE=7-2=5,∴OF=5,∴DF=OD+OF=7+5=12．故选:B．
